description: This file demonstrates the usage of KnowledgeTools within a reasoning content capture context, including setting up a knowledge base from a URL, creating agents with different modes (streaming and non-streaming), and printing reasoning content based on agent responses.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model and tools, capable of processing prompts and generating responses.

classes.name: KnowledgeTools
classes.description: A tool that integrates knowledge base access and analysis capabilities into the agent.

classes.name: UrlKnowledge
classes.description: Represents a knowledge base created from URLs, capable of loading and managing web-based information.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A vector database implementation used for storing and searching embeddings.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A model interface for OpenAI's chat models like GPT-4.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads or recreates the knowledge base from the specified URL or data source.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response from the agent, optionally in streaming mode.
